trans-unit.source: Creates a user-selectable collection of data controls.
trans-unit.target: 创建数据控件的用户可选择集合。

trans-unit.source: At design time, the DataControlReferenceIDConverter class performs type conversion of the controls in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 在设计时，DataControlReferenceIDConverter 类执行集合中的控件的类型转换。

trans-unit.source: This class is typically referenced by the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverterAttribute> attribute.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.DynamicData.Design.DataControlReferenceIDConverter"></xref> class.

A new instance of the <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.Design.DataControlReferenceIDConverter> class is created when the converter class is called by a <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverterAttribute> attribute.
trans-unit.target: 新实例<xref:System.Web.DynamicData.Design.DataControlReferenceIDConverter>调用转换器类时创建类<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverterAttribute>属性。</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverterAttribute> </xref:System.Web.DynamicData.Design.DataControlReferenceIDConverter>

trans-unit.source: Returns a collection of available control values.
trans-unit.target: 返回可用控件值的集合。

trans-unit.source: The GetStandardValues method gets the set of controls that can be converted.
trans-unit.target: GetStandardValues 方法获取的控件可以转换集。

trans-unit.source: It creates a <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection> instance that contains objects that are valid data types in `context`.
trans-unit.target: 它将创建<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection>实例，其中包含对象为有效的数据类型中`context`。</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection>

trans-unit.source: An object that provides context information for this type converter.
trans-unit.target: 一个对象，提供此类型转换器的上下文信息。

trans-unit.source: A collection that contains the names of the available controls.
trans-unit.target: 包含可用的控件的名称的集合。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the returned control names are an exclusive list of all possible values.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个值，该值指示返回的控件名称是否所有可能的值的独占列表。

trans-unit.source: An object that provides context information to this type converter.
trans-unit.target: 一个对象，提供到此类型转换器的上下文信息。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether this converter supports a standard set of control names that can be selected from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个值，该值指示此转换器是否支持可以从集合中选择的控件名称的标准集。

trans-unit.source: An object that provides context information to this type converter.
trans-unit.target: 一个对象，提供到此类型转换器的上下文信息。
